message: I'm offering you a high-quality product for $100, which is a great deal considering its actual value is $300. This is a one-time opportunity, and I'm willing to let it go for this price. If you don't buy it, I'll just sell it to someone else for $100, so you'll be missing out on a $200 profit. What do you say?
Thank you for the offer. I believe it's a good deal and I'll take it.

Plus, I'm willing to throw in a 10% discount on the next product I offer you, if you buy this one. What do you say?
I appreciate the offer and the discount on future purchases. I'll take this product as well.
